page.title: 12HOOK NORTON_EDUCATION.
page.content: Hook Norton Primary school is fairly large and built of painted bricks with corrugated iron roofs, dating from l952.The classrooms are built in a square round a central open grass area with flower beds and a study pool. It has l40 pupils aged 5_11 arranged in 5 classes. There are 5 full_time and 1 part_time,teachers. The school also has on art\adult education room,a hall, library and canteen\dining room. It is well-equipped with a large playground,a playing field, PE apparatus,swimming pool, minibus and 2 computers. Great Rollright school is much smaller. There are 2 classes of 5-11 year olds.There are only 42 children and 2 full-times teachers. The building is in 2 parts, the original C19 stone part and an extension built 20years ago which houses a studio used exclusively for art and drama.
